comment.author: 14302637@N08
comment._content: The coachbuilding works were at Prior Park. O'Gorman's garage and administrative offices were at Parnell Street. See the long info reply from Desktop 123 on www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland/7095717381

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mickhuett] It absolutely was taken on the same day, and from the other end of the works.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/blackpoolbeach] No pumps outside in the 1920s - taken on Saturday, 15 April 1922.

Hi NLI - Any chance of getting the Parnell Street photo catalogue.nli.ie/Record/P_WP_3003/Image?lookfor=http://ww... published on Flickr - Better definition then and I may be able to read the 3 Posters on the window?
